Soul Eater.name: Soul Eater
Soul Eater.blurb: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
Soul Eater.description: Innate: Nasus permanently has  12 / 18 / 24% (based on level) bonus life steal.

Siphoning Strike.name: Siphoning Strike
Siphoning Strike.blurb: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
Siphoning Strike.description: Active: Nasus's next basic attack within 10 seconds gains  25 bonus range and deals  bonus physical damage.
Siphoning Strike.leveling:
Bonus Physical Damage:
30 / 50 / 70 / 90 / 110 (+ Siphoning Strike stacks)
Siphoning Strike.description2: If Siphoning Strike kills its target, Nasus permanently gains 3 stacks, increased to 12 if its target is a champion, large minion, or large monster.
Siphoning Strike.description3: Siphoning Strike resets Nasus' autoattack timer.
Siphoning Strike.notes:
* Siphoning Strike's cooldown will not start until the enhanced attack is used or it expires.
 Siphoning Strike's bonus range stacks with  Fury of the Sands', granting 200 total range.
 Nasus can gain Siphoning Strike stacks by last-hitting any targetable enemy units (wards, structures,  Tibbers,  Powder Keg,  Tentacles,  Voidlings,  Jack in the Box,  Noxious Trap,  Mist Walkers,  Maiden of the Mist)
 Siphoning Strike will not generate stacks from secondary units killed by item area-of-effect damage (Cleave, Crescent, Icy Zone).
 Siphoning Strike will not generate stacks from jungle plants.
 The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal.
 Only Siphoning Strike's base damage interacts with  critical strikes but the bonus damage will still apply  life steal as well as affect structures.
 If Nasus is  blinded Siphoning Strike's enhanced attack will not be consumed.

Wither.name: Wither
Wither.blurb: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
Wither.description: Active: Nasus ages the target enemy champion for 5 seconds,  slowing them by 35% and  crippling them by half that amount, both increasing over the duration.
Wither.leveling:
Maximum Slow:
47 / 59 / 71 / 83 / 95%
Additional Slow Per Second:
3 / 6 / 9 / 12 / 15%

Maximum Cripple:
23.5 / 29.5 / 35.5 / 41.5 / 47.5%
Additional Cripple Per Second:
1.5 / 3 / 4.5 / 6 / 7.5%
Wither.notes: * If Wither's duration is reduced by  Tenacity the effects will apply faster so the maximum values are reached when the shortened duration ends.

Spirit Fire.name: Spirit Fire
Spirit Fire.blurb: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
Spirit Fire.description: Active: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at the target location, dealing  magic damage to enemies in the area.
Spirit Fire.description2: The flame then remains for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to all enemies within and reducing their armor while they remain, lingering for 1 second.
Spirit Fire.leveling2:
Magic Damage Per Second:
11 / 19 / 27 / 35 / 43 (+ 12% AP)
Total Magic Damage:
110 / 190 / 270 / 350 / 430 (+ 120% AP)
Armor Reduction:
15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35% of target's armor
Spirit Fire.notes: * Spirit Fire grants  sight of the target area (is smaller than the damage area) for a short duration on-cast.

Fury of the Sands.name: Fury of the Sands
Fury of the Sands.blurb: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
Fury of the Sands.description: Active: Nasus empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining bonus  health,  armor and  magic resistance, increased size, and  50 bonus range on his basic attacks for the duration.
Fury of the Sands.description2: While Nasus is empowered, he deals magic damage to all enemies around him each second, capped at 240, gains bonus  armor and  magic resistance each second, and  Siphoning Strike's  cooldown is reduced by 50%.
Fury of the Sands.leveling2:
Magic Damage Per Second:
3 / 4 / 5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
Total Magic Damage:
45 / 60 / 75% (+ 15% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
Bonus Resistances Per Second:
1 / 2 / 3
Total Bonus Resistances:
30 / 65 / 100
Fury of the Sands.notes: * Fury of the Sands'  bonus health is not affected by  Grievous Wounds and Nasus retains it once the duration ends.
